definition: A device commonly employed for the purpose of refining or smoothing surfaces through the application of abrasion or grinding techniques. It is typically utilized in various industrial or craft settings to enhance the texture or shape of materials.

examples.german: Er benutzt eine Schleifmaschine, um das Holz zu glätten.
examples.english: He is using a grinding machine to smooth the wood.
The grinding machine produces a lot of dust.
The grinding machine has different grinding wheels.

examples.german: Sie müssen eine Schleifmaschine verwenden, um die Metallkanten abzurunden.
examples.english: You need to use a grinding machine to round off the metal edges.
